boat.full_description:
A SEA WORTHY CRAFT THAT HAS GOOD ABILITY ON ALL POINTS OF SAILING.THAT YOU CAN SAIL SITTING INSIDE OF THE ROOMY COCKPIT , NO CENTRE PLATE.

SUITABLE FOR ESTUARY, LOCH, LAKE & INSHORE COASTAL USE .

VERY STABLE BOAT WITH  ROOMY COCKPIT, LONG SHALLOW KEEL , 18 INCH DRAFT AFT / 12 INCHES DRAFT FWD.

DARK BLUE ORIGINAL GELL COAT TOPSIDES IN VERY GOOD CONDITION

WHITE ORIGINAL GELL COAT FORE/AFT DECKS & INSIDE COCKPIT AREA, IN VGC.

LARGE HINGED LOCKERS FWD/AFT.

VARNISHED HARDWOOD GUN WHALES, THWART & FLOORS.

VARNISHED MAST & SPARS  WITH WHITE MAINSAIL & FURLING JIB.

SAILS LAUNDED IN AUGUST 2020 & NEW UV STRIP ON JIB IN AUGUST 2020.

BARN DOOR STYLE LARGE VARNISHED HARDWOOD RUDDER WITH LONG CURVED TILLER ENABLING HELM TO SIT AMIDSHIPS.

SPRAY HOOD WITH ALLOY FRAME.

OUTBOARD WELL , YAMAHA 4HP 4 STROKE LONG SHAFT OUTBOARD.

COVER,ANCHOR, FENDERS.

DUTCH GALVANISED TRAILER, 2004 ,SINGLE AXLE UNBRAKED ,WINCH, SEALED BEARINGS, 5 STUD RIMS , LARGE  HEAVY DUTY TYRES ,NEW SPARE WHEEL. HAS BREAK BACK OPTION, BOAT CAN BE LAUNCHED & RECOVERED  SINGLE HANDED.

THE OWNER DAVE HART IS A 75 YEAR OLD FORMER BOAT BUILDER & SAILING COACH NOW HOBBY BOAT RESTORER & HAS OWNED & SAILED  SEVERAL OF THESE LOCH BROOM BOATS OVER THE PAST 30 YEARS.

THIS ONE WAS COMPLETED BY A BOAT YARD IN HOLLAND  UNDER LICENCE  & HAS HAD 2 PRIOR OWNERS .
boat.name: Thistle
boat.short_description: A SEA WORTHY CRAFT THAT HAS GOOD ABILITY ON ALL POINTS OF SAILING
